meanings.definition: Resembling a cliff in steepness or height.
meanings.sent1: The clifflike wall of the canyon was almost vertical.
meanings.sent2: The mountain had a clifflike edge that made it challenging to climb.
meanings.sent3: The clifflike bookshelf in the library seemed to defy gravity.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as clifflike as the towering rock formations.
meanings.sent5: The clifflike shadow cast by the building loomed over the street below.

meanings.definition: Having characteristics similar to a cliff.
meanings.sent1: The clifflike structure of the building made it stand out in the city skyline.
meanings.sent2: The clifflike overhang of the rock provided shade for the hikers below.
meanings.sent3: The clifflike cake towered over the other desserts at the party.
meanings.sent4: His stubbornness was as clifflike as the rocky coastline.
meanings.sent5: The clifflike roar of the waterfall echoed through the valley.
